#include<stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cctype>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define FORD(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define REP(i,n) FOR(i,0,n)
#define MAX 200000002
#define MOD 500009
 
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
 
inline void fps(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
//int neg = 0;
for(;((c<48 || c>57) /*&& c != '-'*/);c = gc());
//if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
//if(neg) x=-x;
}
int ct[12];LL ans=0;
void rec(int max,int i,int k){
if(max==0){ans++;return;}
if(max<0 || i < 0 || k <1)return;
if(ct[i])rec(max-ct[i],i-1,k-1);
rec(max,i-1,k);
}
 
int main()
{
 
int i,T,k,kk,a;LL max;
fps(T);
while(T--){
memset(ct,0,sizeof(ct));ans=0;
REP(i,11){
fps(ct[i]);
}
fps(k);kk=k;
sort(ct,ct+11);
max=0;
//REP(i,11)cout <<ct[i] <<" " ;
for(i=10;i>=0 && k;i--,k--)max+=ct[i];
rec(max,10,kk);
 
printf("%llu\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
